title: Forest heritage
creator_credit: Roy Layzell, Andrew Rice and Esso Oil Company
brief_description: The film gives a picture of life in the New Forest in Hampshire, featuring the ponies, the ancient customs and historical remains of the Forest, and the work of the Forestry Commission.
